author: trent_vanepps
content:
Hey all, just wanted to give a quick update > Whiteblock has been heads down redesigning our methodology, topology, and test client for our gossipsub testing efforts in collaboration with Adam Hanna from the Protocol Labs side.

The specific utilities and details of these tests are provided within this repository: https://github.com/whiteblock/gossipsub-testing

Please join us here for discussion: https://community.whiteblock.io/t/gossipsub-tests/17
